entry.title: Personal History
entry.summary:
A Time for Reflection
For the first two years of my studies, I focused solely on the field of investment, immersing myself in the world of value investment, and reading books by successful investors, such as Warren Buffet and Peter Lynch. However, as I delved deeper into the subject, I began to ask myself two questions: “In an age overflowing with data, is an approach like value investing, ...
